SEARCH
Package beans.deposit.api

Class SimulatedPayment

java.lang.Object
beans.deposit.api.SimulatedPayment
public class SimulatedPayment extends Object
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for receiving payment information from bank simulator. Maps JSON payment data to Java object for processing.
Author:
Danilo Spera
